Token.Abstract: The RKRelationshipConnectionOperation class is a subclass of NSOperation that manages the connection of NSManagedObject relationships as described by an RKConnectionMapping object. When executed, the operation will find related objects by searching the associated managed object cache for a matching object whose destination attribute value matches that of the associated managed object's source attribute.
Initializes the receiver with a given managed object, connection mapping, and managed object cache.

Parameter.Name: managedObject
Parameter.Abstract: The object to attempt to connect a relationship to.

Parameter.Name: connectionMapping
Parameter.Abstract: A mapping describing the relationship and attributes necessary to perform the connection.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectCache
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object cache from which to attempt to fetch a matching object to satisfy the connection.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given managed object, connection mapping, and managed object cache.

Token.Abstract: The managed object the receiver will attempt to connect a relationship for.
The managed object the receiver will attempt to connect a relationship for.
The connection mapping describing the relationship connection the receiver will attempt to connect.
The connection mapping describing the relationship connection the receiver will attempt to connect.
The managed object cache the receiver will use to fetch a related object satisfying the connection mapping.
The managed object cache the receiver will use to fetch a related object satisfying the connection mapping.
